title: Les Cavaliers de L'orage = the Horsemen of the Storm
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Jean Giono.
description: Always accompanied by his brother Ange, Jason is a fine rider and wrestling champion. He supplies horses to the local army captain, Castaing. Castaing is married to Marie, a doctor. When WWI breaks out, the two brothers enlist and are sent off to the Balkans where they meet up with Marie again. She has just lost her husband and works in a military hospital. Jealousy rears its ugly head and the brothers start to compete for her favor. Awards: French Academy of Cinema (Cesar) 1984: Best music for Michel Portal.  Credits: Producer, Tarak ben Ammar ; director, Gerard Vergez ; writers, Gerard Vergez, Daniel Boulanger ; photography, Andre Diot ; music, Michel Portal. Cast: Marlene Jobert, Gerard Klein, Vittorio Mezzogiorno, Wadeck Stanczak, Hanns Zischler.
